description:
Camera360 - My Camera, My Life

First choice photo app for over 300 million users around the world!

No.1 App in Photo & Video category in 75 countries, including US, Germany, Brazil, Spain, Russia, Korea, Singapore, Malaysia, India and China.

Simply the most powerful and completely free photo shooting and editing app in the world. Camera360 has more than 200+ EXCLUSIVE FREE photo filters and multiple professional adjustment tools such as tilt-shift, overlay, texture etc.

As your most professional mobile photography assistant, Camera360 is the ONLY app you will need to shoot, edit and share your photographs on the go.

##10+ AMAZING CAMERA MODES##
SELFIE MODE
Love taking selfies? Camera360 comes with auto facial detection, timer, natural skin touch up, even night mode for low light shooting. It has everything you need for taking the perfect selfie.

FILTER MODE
Camera360 has 200+ uniquely designed photo filters including all of your favorite styles: vintage, film, nostalgia, retro, HDR, lomo, b&w, comic, magic sky.

EASY CAM MODE
With auto scene recognition (portrait, scenery, low light and back light), shooting great photos in different conditions has never been so easy!

SCENES MODE
Shoot with super creative and fun scene templates. 

AUDIO MODE
Capture your most memorable moments with both image and sound. 

ID PHOTO MODE
With auto background detection and removal, you can shoot your ID photo anywhere! With multiple features and clothing options, you can take the perfect ID photo with Camera360. 

MULTIGRID CAMERA MODE
Take cool split screen photos with live multi-grid view. 

BURST CAMERA MODE
Continuous high speed shooting mode; press and hold to shoot multiple photographs in rapid succession. Never again miss another important moment.

LOW LIGHT MODE
State of the art low light image enhancement with very low noise level. 

DOUBLE EXPOSURE MODE
Superimpose two exposures to create a single image. Have fun experimenting with different combinations for amazing double exposure results!

##OTHER FEATURES##
CLOUD ALBUM
Store and manage your photo library hassle free, keep all of your memories safe and sound in Camera360 Cloud!

PHOTO EDITING
Professional editing tools for all your editing needs: overlay, crop, rotate, adjust, texture, and blur tools.

COLLAGE MAKER
Create awesome collages with multiple templates.

Creativity has no limits with Camera360! Put art in your hand and start capturing every precious moment in your life with Camera360 now!

Please follow us on:
Facebook： https://www.facebook.com/camera360official
Twitter： https://twitter.com/Camera360
Instagram: Camera360_Official

For more details, check out our website: www.camera360.com
